Container.Name: TAK-Server-5.4-All-in-One
Container.Overview:
TAK Server 5.4 All-in-One Container for Unraid
**SIMPLE ONE-CONTAINER SETUP:** 1. Download TAK Server 5.4 ZIP from https://tak.gov/products/tak-server 2. Place the ZIP file in /mnt/user/appdata/tak-server 3. Start this container - complete TAK Server runs inside 4. Monitor container logs for credentials and startup 5. Access TAK Server at https://YOUR-IP:8445
**FEATURES:** ✓ Single container solution (no docker-compose complexity) ✓ Memory-optimized extraction process ✓ Automatic JKS certificate generation ✓ Built-in PostgreSQL database ✓ Complete TAK Server with web interface ✓ Automatic startup and configuration
**ADVANTAGES:** ✓ No multiple container dependencies ✓ No volume mounting issues ✓ No container orchestration problems ✓ Perfect for Unraid Community Applications
Container.PostArgs: sh -c "echo 'TAK Server 5.4 All-in-One Starting...' && apk add --no-cache bash git unzip zip openssl curl openjdk17-jre-headless postgresql postgresql-contrib && echo 'Downloading setup scripts...' && git clone https://github.com/Zeroradiance/tak-server-unraid.git /tmp/taksetup && cp -r /tmp/taksetup/scripts /setup/ && cp /tmp/taksetup/CoreConfig.xml /setup/ && cd /setup && if [ -f takserver-docker-*.zip ]; then echo 'Extracting TAK Server files...' && unzip -q takserver-docker-*.zip && cp -r takserver-docker-*/* . && rm -rf takserver-docker-*/; fi && chmod +x scripts/setup-unraid-single.sh && exec scripts/setup-unraid-single.sh"

Config.Name: TAK Server Data
Config.Description: Directory where TAK Server ZIP file should be placed and where all data is stored

Config.Name: TAK Web Interface
Config.Description: Port for TAK Server web interface

Config.Name: Startup Timeout
Config.Description: TAK Server startup timeout in seconds
